creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a rotary dial wall telephone with a memo board above it; calendar with a picture of a woman with a horse at center; butterfly wall plaques in URC; window at left; image of a cartoon woman talking on an old-fashioned telephone above memo board
portfolio: From Human Arts and Technology series
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / JOANNE LEONARD
title: [Wall telephone with memo board and calendar]
